title: hello i am the first canadian who used LIHK

replies.msg:
my roommate is from Hk and he said LIHKG is good to learn Cantonese . He gave this account to me so I hope everything goes well

P.S the emojis in LIHKG are really funny

Feel free to ask me any questions !

Best way to learn about the HK pop culture though, you have AM1430 Fairchild Radio. Simply tune in and listen, you'll have a much better time learning HK pop culture there.
